item.title: Steve add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Steve add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "Music has always been a matter of Energy to me, a question of Fuel. Sentimental people call it Inspiration, but what they really mean is Fuel. I have always needed Fuel. I am a serious consumer. On some nights I still believe that a car with the gas needle on empty can run about fifty more miles if you have the right music very loud on the radio." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Steve add a quote by Thomas Pynchon
item.description: "If they can get you asking the wrong questions, they don't have to worry about answers." -- Thomas Pynchon

item.title: Steve add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Nobody's perfect. Well, there was this one guy, but we killed him...." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Steve add a quote by James Ellroy
item.description: "Anybody who doesn't know that politics is crime has got a few screws loose." -- James Ellroy

item.title: Steve add a quote by Vine Deloria Jr.
item.description: "When asked by an anthropologist what the Indians called America before the white men came, an Indian said simply "Ours." -- Vine Deloria Jr.

item.title: Steve add a quote by Vine Deloria Jr.
item.description: "Religion is for people who're afraid of going to hell. Spirituality is for those who've already been there." -- Vine Deloria Jr.

item.title: Steve add a quote by Vine Deloria Jr.
item.description: "Never has America lost a war ... But name, if you can, the last peace the United States won. Victory yes, but this country has never made a successful peace because peace requires exchanging ideas, concepts, thoughts, and recognizing the fact that two distinct systems of life can exist together without conflict. Consider how quickly America seems to be facing its allies of one war as new enemies." -- Vine Deloria Jr.
